      • shadow

        public ManagedContext shadow()
        Description copied from interface: Context
        Create a new Context with the same underlying Ã˜MQ context, with an empty (separate) list of managed Sockets and Backgroundables.

        The returned context will not attempt to terminate the underlying Ã˜MQ context when closed, and will only close managed sockets, etc.

        Specified by:
        shadow in interface Context
        Returns:
        A new context with the same underlying Ã˜MQ context
